description: This Italian style plant based stew is hearty and filling with vegan sausages and butterbeans.
name: Italian Sausage Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large onion, peeled and finely sliced
2 large red capsicum, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat. Cook the onions for 5 minutes, add the sliced capsicums and zucchini and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the chopped sausages and cook for 3-4 minutes, stir in the garlic and oregano and cook for 1 minute.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes and butter beans and stir in the olives. Simmer for 15 minutes until the vegetables and sausages are tender.
